works.description: American fashion designer Ralph Lauren, best known for his Polo Ralph Lauren clothing brand, now makes solar power a stylish accessory with the new Solar Panel Backpack from its high-end RLX line. The Ralph Lauren RLX solar backpack is made in Italy using water-resistant material, and has a large solar panel built in to its back. The built-in solar panel produces 3.45-watt current, and is being claimed to charge your mobile phone or iPod in two to three hours.
